ITEM.szItemDesc: A carbine version of Stoner 63 system weapons, with a folding buttstock and a 15.7" barrel.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A AMT large pistol in .50 AE caliber, this is the brainchild of Harry Sanford.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A AMT large pistol in .50 AE caliber, this is the brainchild of Harry Sanford.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MP5K-PDW (Personal Defense Weapon) is improve on MP5K. It is equipped with a side-folding buttstock and a threaded three-lug barrel for attaching suppressors.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MP5K-PDW (Personal Defense Weapon) is improve on MP5K. It is equipped with a side-folding buttstock and a threaded three-lug barrel for attaching suppressors.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The PLA issue frist big caliber sniper rifle (Anti-Matériel Rifle).
ITEM.szBRDesc: The PLA issue frist big caliber sniper rifle (Anti-Matériel Rifle).

ITEM.szItemDesc: The OTs-02 Kiparis (Cypress) had been developed on request from Soviet army. It is adopted by MVD and Russian police and issued to various special troops.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The OTs-02 Kiparis (Cypress) had been developed on request from Soviet army. It is adopted by MVD and Russian police and issued to various special troops.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Mk24 SOCOM Pistol (NAVY version of SIG SAUER P226) with a LAM and a sound suppressor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Mk24 SOCOM Pistol (NAVY version of SIG SAUER P226) with a LAM and a sound suppressor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A bull-pup version of SKS semi-auto rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A Ruger Mini-14 in Muzzlelite Bull Pup Stock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A set of shorter Picatinny rail upgrade kit from UltiMAK, it allows some modern optics to be installed on classic weapons from the early and mid 20th century.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A set of shorter Picatinny rail upgrade kit from UltiMAK, it allows some modern optics to be installed on classic weapons from the early and mid 20th century.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Unlike conventional vertical fore-grips, the Magpul AFG takes into account natural body mechanics. By positioning the shooter's hand high on the centerline of the bore, the AFG helps mitigate recoil and control the weapon, facilitating faster, more accurate follow-up shots.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unlike conventional vertical fore-grips, the Magpul AFG takes into account natural body mechanics. By positioning the shooter's hand high on the centerline of the bore, the AFG helps mitigate recoil and control the weapon, facilitating faster, more accurate follow-up shots.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The PEQ16A has a 100 lumen lamp assembly where the IR illuminator used to be at. Insight moved the IR illuminator into a three lamp module in the same line as the IR and visible laser.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The PEQ16A has a 100 lumen lamp assembly where the IR illuminator used to be at. Insight moved the IR illuminator into a three lamp module in the same line as the IR and visible laser.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This old laser aiming device made by Hensoldt AG, it weighs enough to be a weapon (club) in its own right. Fits older HK rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Hard to find these days, the eye safety warning on this Aiming Point Projector is indicative of its useful range. Fits older HK rifles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Corsak Laser is a powerful and compact laser target designation unit for a wide range of Russian weapons. Can be used together with night vision goggles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Corsak Laser is a powerful and compact laser target designation unit for a wide range of Russian weapons. Can be used together with night vision goggles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Infrared Target Pointer (ITP) is a laser sight for use on rifles which was manufactured by Insight Technology. The two laser are tied into one 6-mode switch and point to 600 meters.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Infrared Target Pointer (ITP) is a laser sight for use on rifles which was manufactured by Insight Technology. The two laser are tied into one 6-mode switch and point to 600 meters.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Mustard Gas bomb features waterproof "horseshoe" snap-off propellant increments and the M734 multi-option fuse. This fuse can be set by hand for a delayed, impact, near-surface, or proximity burst detonation.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Mustard Gas mortar shell features waterproof "horseshoe" snap-off propellant increments and the M734 multi-option fuse. WARNING: this item may release a noxious odour upon detonation.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A six-shot clip of 20mm high explosive grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A six-shot magazine of 20mm high explosive fragmentation grenades. Fun for the whole family!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ever had that occasion when one mustard gas grenade just wasn't enough? Amuse your friends and alarm your enemies with not one, but 6 burstable 20mm Grenades of WWI goodness.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Take a lesson from the Central Powers in WWI and don't fire these shells into prevailing tradewinds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mask your advance or cover your withdrawal with these six smoke grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Mask your advance or cover your withdrawal with these smoke grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six grenades siphon the air out of their blast radius, leaving enemies helpless on the ground.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These grenades siphon the air out of their blast radius, leaving enemies helpless on the ground.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Before deploying these six grenades indoors or in a confined space, remember: gas takes the shape of its container.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Before deploying these grenades indoors or in a confined space, remember: gas takes the shape of its container.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated blast wave.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated blast wave.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six 25mm HE grenades arm in mid-air to prevent harm to the user.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These 25mm HE grenades arm in mid-air to prevent harm to the user.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six grenades are filled with an invariably fatal blistering agent.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These grenades are filled with an invariably fatal blistering agent.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Screen your troop movement or indicate potential LZ's for the medivac with these six smoke grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Screen your troop movement or indicate potential LZ's for the medivac with these smoke grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Leave them breathless, literally, with six 25mm stun grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Leave them breathless, literally, with a 25mm stun grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Nothing stops a riot or stifles enemy fire like a chemical irritant grenade. Except maybe six of them.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nothing stops a riot or stifles enemy fire like a chemical irritant. Buy it by the clip-full in 25mm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Turn the air in the surrounding atmospheric air into a lethal firestorm with themobaric ordinance. Six rounds of superheated fun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Turn the air in the surrounding atmospheric air into a lethal firestorm with themobaric ordinance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is a six-shot grenade cylinder filled with fragmentation grenades. When fired from the 40mm grenade launcher each grenade will ignite its encased TNT after a short delay.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a six-shot grenade cylinder filled with fragmentation grenades. Each grenade features a time-delayed firing device to ignite its encased TNT. Fired from the MGL Mk.1 grenade launcher, this round can provide great lethal coverage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mustard Gas is known for its blistering and burning effect. Now you can multiply this effect by six with this cylinder.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Disclaimer: This product is classed as a chemical weapon and is banned by the Geneva convention. Sold for pest control purposes only!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mustard Gas is known for its blistering and burning effect. With this round you will make your opponents cough out most of their internal organs.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Disclaimer: This product is classified as chemical weapon and is banned by the Geneva convention. Sold for pest control purposes only!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Now they see you, now they don't. When properly employed, this six-shot 40mm smoke grenade cylinder will leave your opposition thinking they're dealing with Houdini himself.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When fired from a MGL Mk.1, the grenades in this six-shot cylinder will quickly release a cloud of smoke that will aid in battlefield entry or withdrawal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When fired from the MGL Mk.1, the six projectiles contained in this cylinder will create a massive vacuum that will leave your enemies gasping for air.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This six-shot MGL Mk.1 grenade cylinder contains projectile rounds that will create a massive vacuum, depriving the surrounding impact area of oxygen. Anyone standing within the detonated area will be left gasping, as waves of air rush back into its core.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Also known as CS gas, this substance is ideal for crowd control, but it works well only on crowds that are not wearing gas masks.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Tear Gas cylinder contains nasty substance that certainly is not odorless. In fact, after walking through a cloud of this stuff you will smell like you just chopped a million raw onions. No, forget that, it's worse.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade works great for crowd control, but it tends to require more clean up afterwards than standard Tear Gas.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Thermobaric grenades provide a better kill probability than standard HE grenades. An overpressure blast uses atmospheric oxygen once the volatile liquid inside the grenade spreads and ignites.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 43mm High Explosive grenades will fit nicely in your GM-94 grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: High Explosive grenades for the GM-94. Sold only in packs of four since we here at Bobby Ray's want to make sure that you won't go into battle with a half-empty weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 43mm Mustard Gas grenades will fit nicely in your GM-94 grenade launcher. Warning: Inhaling contents will cause a painful death.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This product is classified as chemical weapon and is banned by the Geneva convention. Sold for pest control purposes only!

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 43mm Smoke grenades will fit nicely in your GM-94 grenade launcher. When you need cover, fire off a couple of these.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Smoke rounds for the GM-94. Sold only in packs of four since we here at Bobby Ray's want to make sure that you won't go into battle with a half-empty weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Four 43mm stun grenades for the GM-94 launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Crowd of rioters or room full of hyperactive children (we kid, of course), a stun grenade will take the wind and the fight right out of them.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Drop 4 CS gas grenades on your target and reduce them to blubbering wrecks.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Drop 4 CS gas grenades on your target and reduce them to blubbering wrecks.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Perfect for those times when you need to make a big entrance.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A rocket propelled grenade is perfect for those times when you need to make a big entrance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Works exactly like a can opener, but on tanks. Oh, and it's a bit louder.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Works exactly like a can opener, but on tanks. Oh, and it's a bit louder.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Guaranteed to blow your enemies away.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Guaranteed to blow your enemies away.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Teach them the hard way that flammable and inflammable mean the same damn thing.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 40mm HE grenade will fit the GP-25/GP-30 launcher on your Kalashnikov.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 40mm HE shell for Russian grenade launchers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This nasty little device contains TNT and a little something extra that makes it explode in mid-air, spreading destruction to a wider range than a regular 40mm grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 40mm jumping grenade - a few hundred bucks. Grenade launcher - a few thousand. Seeing your enemies' expression once they see this little bugger merrily hopping towards them - priceless.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This cylinder of 40mm fuel-air grenades transforms the user into a walking, talking WMD.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This cylinder of 40mm fuel-air grenades transforms the user into a walking, talking WMD.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Three rounds of High Explosive (HE) death configured for the AICW's hi-tech integrated launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Take the load off the team grenadier with Metal Storm's 40mm multi shot grenade system. Three rounds of High Explosive (HE) death configured for the AICW's hi-tech integrated launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Intended for riot control, we're sure you'll find some other use for this 3 round stack of 40mm tear gas.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Take the load off the team grenadier with Metal Storm's 40mm multi shot grenade system. Three rounds of tear gas should be enough to quickly pacify any threat

ITEM.szItemDesc: Stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm Smoke, best used for covering infiltrations and extractions.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Quickly lay down a long wall of blinding smoke with a three round stack of 40mm Metal Storm enabled 40mm smoke grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm Mustard Gas. Caution: Check wind before use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These things shouldn't exist, but here we have a three round stack of 40mm grenades containing what appears to be Mustard Gas. Where in the world did these things come from, we won't tell.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm Thermobaric. Caution: Check range before use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Overpressure and heat, instead of shrapnel, is the prime killing effect of Thermobaric explosives. This new way to clear a large space, is packaged in the new Metal Storm 40mm multi-shot grenade stack for the AICW.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm stun. For those times when you need the target down but alive.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Knock the wind out of any line of infantry with this compact 3 round stack of stun grenades made possible by Metal Storm's patented electronic firing system. Caution: these are only stun weapons, they only buy time.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated napalm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated napalm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Turn the surrounding area into a lethal firestorm with napalm ordinance. Six rounds of superheated fun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Turn the surrounding area into a lethal firestorm with napalm ordinance. Six rounds of superheated fun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade works great for crowd control, but it tends to require more clean up afterwards than standard Tear Gas.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nothing's beats super-heated napalm for burning off some calories.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This cylinder of 40mm napalm grenades transforms the user into a walking, talking WMD.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This cylinder of 40mm napalm grenades transforms the user into a walking, talking WMD.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm Napalm. Caution: Check range before use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This super hot way to clear a large space is packaged in the new Metal Storm 40mm multi-shot grenade stack for the AICW.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Flashbangs are used to confuse and disorient a potential threat for up to five seconds. They work best indoors, and are only partially effective outdoors at night.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The flash of light from this grenade momentarily activates all sensory pigment in the retina, making vision impossible for approximately five seconds until the eye restores the pigment to its original, unstimulated state.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The VG-70 26.5mm Grenade is for Czech VG-70 underbarrel mounted grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The VG-70 26.5mm Grenade is for Czech VG-70 underbarrel mounted grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A Russian Dual Laser and Shot Reflex Sight for many eastern and western weapons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Russian Dual Laser and Shot Reflex Sight for many eastern and western weapons.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Noveske KX3 "Flaming Pig" can cover the muzzle flashes, and reduce a little muzzle noise.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Noveske KX3 "Flaming Pig" can cover the muzzle flashes, and reduce a little muzzle noise.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Russian reflex sight sits on a sidemount-bracket to fit onto AK-style receivers.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Kobra is the answer to the needs of Russian special forces operatives who need a gunsight for fast target acquisition. Fits most AK rifles instead of a scope.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russian standard scope that fits many AK-type rifles. Magnification is 4x.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Russian PSO-1 fits only on rifles with an AK-style receiver, due to the unique side-mount. It has a 4x magnification.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Better than the PSO-1 (Magnification is 6x), this scope is often used on Russian DMRs and sniper rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you have an older style Russian rifle and need a highpower scope, than this is your best choice. Magnification is 6x.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 30-rds magazine 5.56mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 30-rds magazine 5.56mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 30-rds magzine 9mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 30-rds magzine 9mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Standard equipment for keeping those pesky muzzle flashes from giving away your position.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard equipment for keeping those pesky muzzle flashes from giving away your position.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Trijicon Advanced Combat Optical Gunscope with 4x magnification, an additional RMR Reflex Sight has been mounted atop the eyepiece for faster target acquisition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Trijicon Advanced Combat Optical Gunscope with 4x magnification, an additional RMR Reflex Sight has been mounted atop the eyepiece for faster target acquisition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When a standard laser sight isn't enough, the LAM-200 adds Infrared to increase nighttime visibility.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The LAM-200 is a combination of Laser, IR-Laser, visible Combat-Light and IR-Combat-Light. Essential for night operations specialists.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This reflex dual-illuminated advanced combat gun sight is the new standard for instant any-light shooting accuracy. Because of its ultra-compact size, it can be mounted directly on many pistols, or even on your ACOGs.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This reflex dual-illuminated advanced combat gun sight is the new standard for instant any-light shooting accuracy. It gives you maximum accuracy and true-to-life targeting, instantly.

ITEM.szItemDesc: With this scope you can give precision performance to a bolt-action rifle, AR-10, FAL, G3, SCAR-H, or M-14 serving in the Designated Marksman role.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Dramatically improve your targeting accuracy with this extremely versatile battle scope. Attachable to most rifles, you'll quickly appreciate this scope's accurate windage adjustment, a range-finder precision scale, and coated optics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This universal folding stock can be installed on weapon without buttstock. It can also replace some fixed stocks.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This universal folding stock can be installed on weapon without buttstock. It can also replace some fixed stocks.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This retractable stock can be installed on weapon without buttstock. It can also replace some fixed stocks.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This retractable stock can be installed on weapon without buttstock. It can also replace some fixed stocks.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A wood hand grip that can be attached to most wood handguard gun to enhance burst and selective fire accuracy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A wood hand grip that can be attached to most wood handguard gun to enhance burst and selective fire accuracy.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A special hand grip that can be attached to most modern SMGs and rifles to enhance burst and selective fire accuracy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A special hand grip that can be attached to most modern SMGs and rifles to enhance burst and selective fire accuracy.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A large sound suppressor that can be fitted to most carbines and assault rifles. While it will reduce the muzzle noise and flash, it's still far from silent.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A large sound suppressor that can be fitted to most NATO caliber carbines and assault rifles. Caution: This item is not 100 percent effective on its own. Use it in conjunction with cold-loaded or subsonic ammunition to achieve a greatly reduced muzzle volume.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Whoops. Somebody dropped their cash. Bad for them, good for you.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These might be worth something on the black market.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Perfect for digging your own grave, or hitting people over the head (and then dig their grave).
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Will we ever finally be rid of Tetris?
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Looks like someone recorded some home movies on this thing. They're actually fairly entertaining, if you like watching paint dry.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 15 volts of chemical goodness.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A can of Esso brand oil. Funny, you don't remember seeing any Esso stations around here.
ITEM.szBRDesc: We believe it is safe to say that this oil can is uncontestably the best oil can on the market today. (One year warranty, void if tampered with)

ITEM.szItemDesc: This medal seems to be what passes for a reward for service around here. Maybe there's a chocolately centre?
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This thing just crashes with a blue screen when you boot it up. It might be the humidity. It might just be Windows.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A torn scrap of cloth. Completely devoid of snot.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The finest in Central American cigars. So how did they end up here?
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The third generation of nightvision gear is mostly used by the military. Hightech armies use milspec versions that are more rugged than earlier generation NVG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Want to see through the night as well as most American soldiers? Then this NVG is for you. With a state-of-the-art microchannel tube, you'll get the drop on everyone.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Light amplification is not better than in generation III, but image resolution is better and halos around bright objects are reduced, resulting in a better overall picture.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from the assembly line, the first NVG of generation IV. Just what you need when a clear picture makes the difference between a dead enemy and collateral damage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: For the unhappy trigger-happy folks: Just attach the ACME Trigger Group to your favourite assault rifle and enjoy simple and effective 3-round burst fire.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For the unhappy trigger-happy folks out there, we are proud to present the ACME Trigger Group! Marksmanship skill too low? Tired of firing too many bullets in autofire? Simply attach the ACME Trigger Group to your favourite assault rifle and enjoy simple and effective 3-round burst fire.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Military Urban Camo Compact includes several grey nuanced facial paints, a mirror, and a manual on the proper use and care of your camo compact.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Military Urban Camo Compact includes several grey nuanced facial paints, and a mirror. This long-lasting, non-running, facial paint can be easily removed with soap and water. The kit also includes a manual that outlines the proper use and care of your compact.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Military Desert Camo Compact includes light brown, tan and white cream-based facial paint, a mirror, and a manual on the proper use and care of your camo compact.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Military Desert Camo Compact includes light brown, tan and white cream based facial paint, and a mirror. This long-lasting, non-running, facial paint can be easily removed with soap and water. The kit also includes a manual that outlines the proper use and care of your compact.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This type of scope is often found built-in on modern assault rifles, though it will fit a revolver, shotgun, or SMG as well.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A small scope for mounting onto shortranged guns like revolvers or shotguns. Optional mounts for a few autoloaders available. Usable as a replacement for damaged assault rifle optics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This ACOG designed for the M16 family. Besides CQB ability, it provides enhanced target identification and hit probability out to 800 meters. This model with BAC function and you can keep open two eyes when search target.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Dual-illumination technology is used through fiber optics and self-luminous tritium. This allows the aiming point to be always illuminated without the use of batteries.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 35-rounds magazine 5.56mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 35-rounds magazine 5.56mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.

ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 20-rounds magazine 7.62NATO weapons to allow for the use of the 50-rds XS DRUM magazine.

ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 30-rounds magazine 7.62NATO weapons to allow for the use of the 50-rds XS DRUM magazine.

ITEM.szBRDesc: This Trench Magazine can be installed on Mauser action rifles (K98k or Springfield) to increase magazine capacity.

ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 32-rds magzine 9mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.

ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain .223 REM (M193/196) weapons to allow for the use of the 90-rd MWG drum.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 1PN58 (NSPU) Night Vision Scope is an integrated day/night sight for the Russian Rifle. The magnification is higher than 1PN51.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The 1PN58 (NSPU) Night Vision Scope is an integrated day/night sight for the Russian Rifle. The magnification is higher than 1PN51.

ITEM.szItemDesc: WALTHER continues its long-standing tradition of manufacturing small-bore rifles that have won numerous gold medals in the Olympic games and at World Championship matches with the introduction of the new WALTHER G22.
ITEM.szBRDesc: WALTHER continues its long-standing tradition of manufacturing small-bore rifles that have won numerous gold medals in the Olympic games and at World Championship matches with the introduction of the new WALTHER G22.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The first offering by HK of an enhanced USP with distinct characteristics that make it more attractive to the target shooter.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The first offering by HK of an enhanced USP with distinct characteristics that make it more attractive to the target shooter.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Jericho 941 / "Baby Eagle" pistol developed by Israel Military Industries (IMI) which is a clone of the Czechoslovak Cz-75 pistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Jericho 941 / "Baby Eagle" pistol developed by Israel Military Industries (IMI) which is a clone of the Czechoslovak Cz-75 pistol.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FNP-9 / PRO-9 is a fairy conventional gun, suitable for police / security duties, as well as for self-defense.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The FNP-9 / PRO-9 is a fairy conventional gun, suitable for police / security duties, as well as for self-defense.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mateba MTR-8 revolver is a double / single action revolver of all-steel construction. 8-shot cylinder is located in the frame ahead of the triggerguard, and swings out to the left for reloading.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Mateba MTR-8 revolver is a double / single action revolver of all-steel construction. 8-shot cylinder is located in the frame ahead of the triggerguard, and swings out to the left for reloading.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed for prescision marksman events,this pistol will hit the target everytime.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Designed for prescision marksman events,this pistol will hit the target everytime.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Weapon is a true "machine-pistol" since it is capable of full automatic fire. The SCAMP is something of a cross between a pistol and a SMG firing a .22 caliber round designed especially for it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Shoulder-Launched Multipurpose Assault Weapon is an 83 mm man-portable weapon system made for taking out tanks and bunkers in 500m.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Shoulder-Launched Multipurpose Assault Weapon is an 83 mm man-portable weapon system made for taking out tanks and bunkers in 500m.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Carl-Gustaf recoilless rifle is a single shot, breech loading multi-role weapon nicknamed "the Goose". It has been a popular anti-tank/bunker weapon since 1948.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Blowin' things up since 1948! The upgraded Carl-Gustaf M3 is a first choice for every merc and soldier around the world who requires a reliable yet affordable anti-tank weapon. NOTICE: NAPALM shells are currently available.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Payload is the next-gen long distance anti-material rifle that fires hi-explosive shells and other non-kinetic warheads.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Payload is the next-gen long distance anti-material rifle that fires hi-explosive shells and other non-kinetic warheads.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The PAW-20 was listed as a "new assault rifle", it is obviously not a true assault rifle, but, rather a semi-automatic grenade launcher, which is intended as an infantry support weapon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The PAW-20 was listed as a "new assault rifle", it is obviously not a true assault rifle, but, rather a semi-automatic grenade launcher, which is intended as an infantry support weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The original "Armor Fist" is WWII Germany's cheap, disposable anti-tank weapon. By the way, those red letters on the tube (Achtung! Feuerstrahl!) means "Beware! Fire Jet!"
ITEM.szBRDesc: WW2 German Anti-Tank Weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M41A pulse rifle's underslung M-40 30mm grenade launcher comprises a barrel, breech and a four round internal magazine which is charged by handloading individual grenade cartridges in to the mechanism. A pump action is used to load rounds into the breech and cock the firing mechanism.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The PN 30mm pump-action grenade launcher just for M41A Pulse Rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A standard 22mm flashhider that can be used to hold and launch 22mm standard rifle grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A standard 22mm flashhider that can be used to hold and launch 22mm standard rifle grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This rifle grenade launcher is a specially shaped muzzle device, can be attacked to most rifles to fire rifle grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This rifle grenade launcher is a specially shaped muzzle device, can be attacked to most rifles to fire rifle grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The BS-1 30 mm silenced grenade launcher has appeared under the designation RGA-86 in Russian literature, it is always seen mounted on a suppressed version of the AKS-74U short assault rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Anbau-Granatwerfer 36 is an underbarrel grenade launcher for most of western countries' modern rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Need some extra firepower on your assault rifle? This oversized pistol does the trick. Can launch all standard NATO 40mm grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This model was modified on the Russian GP-30 grenade launcher to fit on QBZ95 assault rifle and to accept the 40mm VOG-25 series grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This model was modified on the Russian GP-30 grenade launcher to fit on QBZ95 assault rifle and to accept the 40mm VOG-25 series grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The literal German translation is "Distress Signal Tool". It is marketed abroad as the Emergency Flare Launcher or EFL. With a five shot magazine, the EFL is a handy little flare launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The literal German translation is "Distress Signal Tool". It is marketed abroad as the Emergency Flare Launcher or EFL. With a five shot magazine, the EFL is a handy little flare launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M202A1 Flash (FLame Assault SHoulder weapon) is a lightweight, reusable, four-tube rocket launcher loaded with 4 incendiary rockets as replacement of the flamethrowers.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M202A1 Flash (FLame Assault SHoulder weapon) is a lightweight, reusable, four-tube rocket launcher loaded with 4 incendiary rockets as replacement of the flamethrowers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Panzerfaust 3 (Pzf 3) is third-generation man-portable antitank weapon, the system combines recoil-less Davis-type launcher and ballistic tactical computer.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Panzerfaust 3 (Pzf 3) is third-generation man-portable antitank weapon, the system combines recoil-less Davis-type launcher and ballistic tactical computer.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FGM-172 SRAW (Short-Range Assault Weapon) is a lightweight, close range missile system, that is designed to complement the Javelin anti-tank missile.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The FGM-172 SRAW (Short-Range Assault Weapon) is a lightweight, close range missile system, that is designed to complement the Javelin anti-tank missile.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A "Sawed-Off" Shorty version replica of the legendary M79 "Thumper" grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A "Sawed-Off" Shorty version replica of the legendary M79 "Thumper" grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The bazooka is a man-portable anti-tank rocket launcher, made famous during World War II where it was one of the primary infantry anti-tank weapons used by the United States Armed Forces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The bazooka is a man-portable anti-tank rocket launcher, made famous during World War II where it was one of the primary infantry anti-tank weapons used by the United States Armed Forces.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This advanced crew-serve weapon system is America's next-gen automatic grenade launcher. Its 25mm grenade can effectively destroy light armor within one kilometer.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This automatic grenade launcher is the large caliber brother of the XM312 HMG, just the thing you need to stop an advancing army.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An experimental polish gun from the late 1980s, this beauty is a handheld beast. With the abilty to blow away oppenents and cover alike, you will never want to leave your home without one.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An experimental polish gun from the late 1980s, this beauty is a handheld beast. With the abilty to blow away oppenents and cover alike, you will never want to leave your home without one.

ITEM.szBRDesc: The Javelin is a manportable, fire-and-forget, anti-tank missile employed by dismounted infantry to defeat current and future armored combat vehicles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed by Eugene Stoner to be the worlds lightest LMG, enabling a soldier to pack full-auto fire power without breaking a sweat.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Czech type 52/57 could trace its anchestry back to famous ZB-26 of the pre-WW2 period. It was one of the most versatile light/medium machinegun of its time.

ITEM.szItemDesc: SIG MG50 was commissioned by Denmark in .30-06 caliber under the designation SIG M51, comes with bipod and carry handle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Finland Valmet model 62 light machine gun uses a tilting bolt, and overall action bears some similarity with famous Czech ZB-26.

ITEM.szItemDesc: As a natural follow on to the G11 caseless rifle project came the LMG11, the Squad Automatic Weapon in full auto only.

ITEM.szItemDesc: FN MAG in the latest U.S military configuration with picatinny rails, folding bipod, free-float heat shield and hydralic buffer buttstock.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This rifle will give you delusions of divinity on the battlefield. If you're looking for a sniper system that redefines the term "HEADSHOT!", then look no further.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Designed for extreme range in Arctic environments, the AWM is the last word in any long range engagement - and we do mean any. Firing the incredibly powerful .300 Win Mag, this rifle's remarkable performance is rivaled only by it's remarkable pricetag.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This heavily modified AR15/M16 was used by Special Forces units of both the US Army and US Navy as light sniper/designated marksman rifle.

ITEM.szBRDesc: The civillian copy of the U.S special forces' Mk12 sniper rifle, in the more powerful 6.8mm SPC caliber.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MEU(SOC) pistol is based on the original M1911 design, they assembled with match-grade barrels and improved stainless steel magazines made by Wilson Combat.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MEU(SOC) pistol is based on the original M1911 design, and has been the standard-issue sidearm for the Force Recon of the United States Marine Corps' Marine Expeditionary Units.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Upgraded on L85A2. The DDL handgaurd features MIL-STD-1913 rails mounted more acces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The DPMS LR-308 Semi Auto Sniper System (SASS) was born of military necessity. It is capable of sub-MOA accuracy at long range, fulfilling its role as a precision rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The DPMS LR-308 Semi Auto Sniper System (SASS) was born of military necessity. It is capable of sub-MOA accuracy at long range, fulfilling its role as a precision rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you've wanted a Galil or Valmet because of the AK reliability with better sights, this is the rifle for you. The VEPR KTR-03 is a highly modified VEPR.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you've wanted a Galil or Valmet because of the AK reliability with better sights, this is the rifle for you. The VEPR KTR-03 is a highly modified VEPR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G3/SG1 is a sniper enhanced variant of the G3 rifle that was made at the request of the Deutsche Bundeswehr (German Army). It most closely resembles the G3 rifle, and retains almost all of the standard features.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A relatively recent Russian manufactured AK variant. This model fires 5.56x45mm rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Gorda is basically something to do with a worn out AKM - it is an AKM receiver that has been modified to fire 9x19mm-Parabellum ammunition, after appropriate modifications.
